title: x/mobile/misc/androidstudio: gomobile exits with non-zero status; Android Studio doesn't provide its stderr
body:
When gomobile exists with non-zero status, Android Studio console doesn't output the error messages. We should both print stdout and stderr of gomobile. See the screenshot below.

cc/ @hyangah

![android](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/108380/9043229/d4b74d60-39c8-11e5-9efc-259d6712cd37.png)
